MeasurementToolMetadata.LongName: Exclusionary Survey: Language and ADHD-Related Questions
MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Parent survey about their child's foreign language usage and ADHD diagnosis status

other_languages_spoken.Description: Does your child speak any language other than English?

learning_English.Description: Did your child learn English before age 3?

other_language_at_home.Description: Are there any other languages spoken in the home?

other_language_at_home_fill-in.Description: What language or languages are spoken at home?

time_other_language_spoken_to_child.Description: What percentage of time is a language besides English spoken to your child?

time_other_language_spoken_by_child.Description: What percentage of time does your child speak a language besides English?

ADHD_diagnosis_status.Description: Is your child diagnosed with ADD/ADHD (Attention Defecit Hyperactivity Disorder)?
